reviews.review: Unfortunately this is my favorite game
fun but when i face spirit i want to ki11 my self

weeeeee!! i like spinning in circles around a shed WOOOOO HOOOO so fun

I used to play with someone special but now i don't wanna play this anymore.

Edit: i love this game and love what it means to me. Its simply perfect. 
(please ignore the fact that mostly of your matches gonna get face camped ;p)

The good: 
1. Bhvr has made it a point these past few patches and this year to listen to its community with all of its quality of life and balance changes
2. They aren't afraid to shake up their game anymore (while still arguably hesitant, they have made huge strides)
3. Best state the game has ever been
4. Fun to play it's hard to describe


The negative
1. Old ui was better fit more of a horror aesthetic imo
2. Needs steam deck/linux support
3. Flashbang needs to take speed and skill checks into account as if another teammate is on the gen you could do an entire gen without getting a Flashbang
4. Needs crossplatform progress across the board

I contemplated about comitting suicide when the survivors teabag me at the gate





10/10 would buy and play again
gg gaming gais, kata Ilham layak untuk ditamatkan
It's just wonderful, and hello Dbd Crew!!!! Love you all!! :D

I've come back to this game after a few years. Holy shit. 
This is so much fun to be killer.

I enjoy this game quite a bit. Killer and Survivor are two different ballparks in game play but both are fun! Just look out for the occasional toxic killer or survivor; just know they're being rude for no good reason. Don't let a survivor t-bagging or clicking their flashlight get you down and don't let a killer who face camps or tunnels do that either. Just have fun the best you can~
One of my favorite games. Gameplay dynamic is different every match and is being constantly supported with new content and bug fixes.
i have no friends and most of these hours played have been killer. pray for me
日服都是蘑菇，韩服都是开哥跟车队，真好玩
I guess it's fun, but be very cautious or this game will torture you.
no real winning or losing. You either live, or you die. You either killed or you sucked.

Very fun and great for people who love horror video games!

Koncept gry jest naprawdę spoko, najgorsze jednak jest lekceważenie community przez devsów oraz samo wykonanie gry czyt.> Masa źle zrobionych hitboxów, błędy typu oślepienie działające nawet na light bornie i wiele wiele więcej (gdy bym miał się rozpisywać to pewnie bym napisał wam całą książkę na 300 stron). Jeśli grasz w tę grę od czasu do czasu to możesz nie doświadczyć dużej ilości błędów i słabych mechanik, ale jeśli masterujesz tą gierkę to nie ma opcji że tego nie zauważysz.

Podsumowując gra to syf, devsi to dzbany a ja, no cóż wychodzi na to że jestem hipokrytą bo gram w tę grę ale totalnie ją odradzam.Natomiast bardziej polecam poczekać na VHS który naprawdę dobrze się zapowiada
sucks ass but i still play it

esta bueno para pasar la tarde
is really cool is a go for if u have a group of people to play and if you dont have no boddy then play as a killer is fine too

gg, но чел делай 360 вовремя, ты молодец, конечно, заворачиваешь, но у меня тайминги сломаны из-за устаревшего железа, а ты ещё бэмишь, не надо так, учись и дальше, а также поздравляю со второй смертью. учись и не бомби, вообщем удачи и если нужна тима, то обращайся научим играть и тонкостям.
